welcome_message_body: Welcome to Madera, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of Central California. Enjoy our vibrant downtown, delicious local cuisine, and scenic vineyards as you explore all that Madera has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Madera Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for private and charter flights at Madera Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Fresno Air Terminal Airport is dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
